mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_ID AS user_id, u.NICKNAME AS nickname, u.PROFILE_IMAGE_URL AS profile_image_url, u.NAME AS user_name FROM USER u WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (USER_ID, PASSWORD, PHONE_FIRST, PHONE_MIDDLE, PHONE_LAST, PHONE_VERIFICATION_CODE, NAME, EMAIL, EMAIL_VERIFICATION_CODE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{phoneFirst}, #{phoneMiddle}, #{phoneLast}, #{phoneVerificationCode}, #{name}, #{email}, #{emailVerificationCode})
INSERT INTO USER (USER_ID, PHONE_FIRST, PHONE_MIDDLE, PHONE_LAST, NAME, EMAIL, SNS) VALUES (#{userId}, #{phoneFirst}, #{phoneMiddle}, #{phoneLast}, #{name}, #{email}, #{sns})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET PASSWORD = #{password}, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT survey_status FROM USER WHERE user_id = #{userId}
